idea-plugin.name: Base16 Classic Dark
idea-plugin.vendor: Jason Heeris (http://heeris.id.au), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Classic Dark for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Jason Heeris (http://heeris.id.au). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
